items.sentence: I wore sunglasses to protect my eyes from the sun.
I managed to acquire the book after a long search.
I inquired whether the plane would arrive on time.
I played video games after I finished my homework.
I was about to leave home when the telephone rang.
I came near being drowned, trying to rescue a boy.
There were footprints in and out of Tom's bedroom.
We'll have to pick the lock to get into the house.
I'll be glad to answer any questions you may have.
I'll pass the information to our sales department.
